config.script:
tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Manual CMD'
	shared.perspective.util.gui.confirmAction("Are you sure you want to change the pump to manual?", tagPath)

tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Start CMD'
	shared.perspective.util.gui.confirmAction("Are you sure you want to start the pump?", tagPath)

tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Stop CMD'
	shared.perspective.util.gui.confirmAction("Are you sure you want to stop the pump?", tagPath)

params.tagQuality: Bad_NotFound("Path '[MQTT Engine]Edge Nodes/Mt Compass/MCP04 Peters Terrace/TAGS/KOYO_PLC/Pump_1/Number_of_Starts' not found.")

Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]Alexandrina/Mt Compass/WWPS/MCP04/Pump 1/Phase Red Motor Current.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]Alexandrina/Mt Compass/WWPS/MCP04/Pump 1/Phase White Motor Current.quality' not found.")
